name: Internet_slugTest
description: Unit tests for the slug functionality of the Internet class.

test_cases.name: testSlugWithDefaultGlueAndWords
test_cases.description: Tests the slug functionality with default glue and words.

test_cases.name: testSlugWithCustomGlueAndWords
test_cases.description: Tests the slug functionality with custom glue and words.

test_cases.name: testSlugWithCustomGlueAndNullWords
test_cases.description: Tests the slug functionality with custom glue and null words.

test_cases.name: testSlugWithNullGlueAndCustomWords
test_cases.description: Tests the slug functionality with null glue and custom words.
